description:
Kanetsugu and Keiji finally make it to Kyoto, despite knowing that they are falling right into Hideyoshi`s trap. Kanetsugu meets up with Keiji, who is visiting the courtesan, Usugumo. Keiji knows that all he has to do to win this battle, is to lower his head to Hideyoshi, but his pride is giving him a hard time doing that. Meanwhile, Usugumo shows them that they aren`t the only eccentrics...
Source: crunchyroll
